recipe:
Muddle Physalis in the shaker and add all ingredients except from egg white to the tin. Then taste with a barspoon and adjust measurements of the homemade syrup depending on the physalis' taste.
It should taste sweet and sour with clear notes of anise and hints of sage (so should the syrup itself be). Next add egg white and reverse shake. Pour into a coupe and serve.

name: dave's caipirinha
ingredients: lime, patron silver blanco tequila, powdered sugar
ingredients_measurements: [['3 spoon', 'Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)'], ['4.5 cl', 'Patrón Silver blanco tequila'], ['1 whole', 'Lime (fresh)']]
recipe:
1. Cut a ripe lime in half (from pole to pole) and remove the core from each half by cutting a cut a v-shaped grove. You'll need one-half of the lime per drink and this should be chopped into wedges and each wedge chopped in half before dropping the resulting 6 or 8 lime chunks into the base tin of a shaker.

2. Add 3 bar spoons powdered sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. If using cubed ice straight from the freezer, add chilled water (or optionally add fruit of choice) and MUDDLE some more. If using watery ice then omit some or all of the water/juice.

4. When sure the limes's juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, POUR the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the shaker tin used to muddle and swirl to rinse tin before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to mix with other ingredients.

6. If using cubed ice, crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

recipe: Add 20 pieces of dried hibiscus flower to your ketel one for 1h30min and let it rest. After the infusion is done, add all ingredients to a mixing glass and stir em up. name: channing's apple daiquiri
ingredients: apple juice, cinnamon powder, lime juice, sugar syrup, white 1-3 year old light rum, white caster sugar
ingredients_measurements: [['6 cl', 'White (charcoal-filtered) 1-3 year old light rum'], ['4.5 cl', 'Apple juice'], ['1.5 cl', 'Lime juice (freshly squeezed)'], ['0.75 cl', 'Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)'], ['1 spoon', 'Cinnamon powder'], ['1 spoon', 'White caster sugar']]
recipe:
Take a plate and dust the cinnamon powder and caster sugar. Mix the two completely so that the cinnamon and sugar are distributed evenly throughout.

Cut a piece of lemon and rub around the entire rim of a glass you wish to serve in, alternatively use water instead of lemon juice.

Upturn the glass that you have just applied lemon juice/water to and dip in cinnamon sugar mix on the plate, you may need to tap around the edges of the glass in several motions. Continue till the entire rim is lightly covered in the cinnamon sugar mix.

SHAKE Apple Juice, Lemon Juice, White Rum and Sugar Syrup with ice and fine strain into prepared glass and SERVE with an apple wedge or plain.

recipe:
1/12 - 2 oz white rum
3/4 oz lime juice
1/2 oz passion fruit syrup
1/2 oz simple syrup
1/2 oz egg white

Add all to shaker of ice. Shake vigorously to froth egg whites. Strain into a coupe or rocks glass with or w/o ice.
I used a rocks glass with a large ice ball. Sip and think "My God, it tastes like there is no alcohol in this. It's dangerously delicious ".

recipe:
First, you'll need a cold glass, so if you don't have prepared one, fill it with ice and leave it while you're preparing the drink.
Put first 6 of the ingredients in the shaker, with ice, shake it for a 30sec, add (if possible) fresh Blueberry & Orange juices, INSTEAD of syrups (make sure it has some greenish color, not blue) & shake once more.
Throw ice out of glass, put 4 fresh ice cubes or else shaped, pour through a fine-mesh strainer, top-up with cold Sauvignon & a bit of soda.

ingredients: dr. adam elmegirab's aphrodite bitters, egg white, lemon juice, regans' orange bitters no.6, rittenhouse bottled-in-bond straight rye whiskey, sugar syrup

recipe:
Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker, but leave half of the egg white in a separate cup.

Add ice to the shaker and shake for 30 seconds. Double strain the ingredients and pour into a rocks glass with a large ice cube.

Whisk remaining egg white with a fork until it forms a nice foam. Pour the foam onto the top of the cocktail.
garnish: Garnish with orange peel and a maraschino cherry.

name: amanda's strawberry caipirinha
ingredients: cachaca, lime, small ripe strawberries, white caster sugar
ingredients_measurements: [['1⁄2 fresh', 'Lime (fresh)'], ['3 spoon', 'White caster sugar'], ['6 cl', 'Cachaça'], ['4 fresh', 'Small ripe strawberries (hulled)']]
recipe:
1. Cut lime in half (from pole to pole) and then slice one of the halves into eight 3-4mm thick half-moon shaped segments and drop into the base of a robust rocks glass.

2. Add 3 bar spoons caster sugar (or ½oz / 15ml sugar syrup 2:1) and MUDDLE.

3. Add chopped strawberries and MUDDLE some more.

4. When sure fruit juice is fully extracted and the sugar dissolved, transfer the muddled fruit and sugar into serving glass (preferably a 30cl / 10oz hi-ball glass).

5. POUR cachaça (stored in the freezer) into the rocks glass (used to muddle) and swirl to rinse glass before pouring cachaça into serving glass. STIR to ensure all ingredients are well mixed.

6. Crack (rather than crush) four to five large ice cubes and drop into serving glass. STIR before topping with more ice and serve with a stirrer (but no straws).
garnish: Stirrer (spoon, wooden lolly stick or stick cut from sugar cane)

recipe:
Add the mint leaves and lemon juice into a shaker and gently muddle.

Add the gin and simple syrup with ice, and shake until well-chilled.

Double-strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: paloma faith'd
ingredients: briottet creme de pamplemousse rose liqueur, olmeca altos plata 100% agave tequila, passion fruit and yuzu cordial, peychaud's aromatic bitters, soda water
ingredients_measurements: [['3.5 cl', 'Olmeca Altos Plata 100% Agave Tequila'], ['8 cl', 'Soda (club soda) water'], ['2 cl', 'Briottet Crème De Pamplemousse Rose Liqueur'], ['1 dash (4 drops)', "Peychaud's Aromatic Bitters"], ['2.5 cl', 'Passion fruit and yuzu cordial (acid adjusted)']]
recipe:
To make drink
Add Olmeca, Pamplemousse Rose liqueur,dash of Peychauds And 25ml of the cordial (see below) top with soda.

Ingredient
Acid adjusted Passion fruit and Yuzu Cordial

To make 1ltr
Zest 3 Yuzu into 500gms powered sugar steep overnight then add Yuzu juice.
Remove pulp from 10 passion fruit add to Yuzu Sherbet. Sous vide for 3hrs
Add 10gms malic acid. (Malic is chosen as the Agave plant produces this at night.)
Fine strain and bottle
Keep in the fridge for 2weeks.
garnish: Clear rod ice with pink or red grapefruit cube on top.

name: smoked jalepeno spicy paloma

recipe:
La Luna Mezcal and a Bright Silver Tequila
Sear Jalapenos over an open bbq flame, or quickly in a cast iron (blistered is good charred is great) Slice into halves or quarters depending on size of pepper and your spice tolerance.

In a Mixing glass, pour Agave Nectar over Ice
Add Lime and Grapefruit Juices
Add Tequila and Mezcal
Shake to blend in Agave nectar and pour into fresh Highball glass with Fresh Ice

Garnish and fill glass with a Grapefruit Infused Sparkling Water
garnish: Garnish glass withLime & Grapefruit wedges Skewer Charred Jalapeno and place into glass

name: amasova cocktail
ingredients: agave syrup, angostura aromatic bitters, kaffir lime leaf, light rum, mandarine napoleon liqueur, prosecco sparkling wine
ingredients_measurements: [['4 cl', 'Bacardi Carta Blanca light rum'], ['2 fresh', 'Kaffir lime leaf'], ['2 dash', 'Angostura Aromatic Bitters'], ['0.75 cl', 'Agave syrup'], ['0.75 cl', 'Mandarine Napoleon liqueur'], ['8 cl', 'Prosecco sparkling wine']]
recipe:
Muddle, Stir, Bild.
Pour rum into a mixing glass and add lime leaves. We make a muddle with the back of a bar spoon. Add ice (it is better to use double-frozen ice) to 3/4 of the mixing glass. Add the remaining ingredients. We make a stir (8 times). Pour into a glass. Add a splash of Prosecco for sparkling.
garnish: Blue cheese, red caviar, agave syrup and a leaf of Kafir lime, put all this on the" pillow " of half a lime (pre-burn). If the desired option is simpler, then it is enough to attach (a decorative clothespin) to the edge of the glass a leaf of Kafir lime for an exotic aroma.

recipe:
ADD tequila, lime juice, grapefruit juice, Cointreau, cinnamon simple syrup*, and 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters to a shaker filled with ice. Shake until chilled. Strain into a Rocks or Collins glass filled with ice. Top with 1-2 oz soda water. Garnish.

*Cinnamon simple syrup recipe*
Combine 1 cup granulated sugar, 1 cup filtered water, and 4 cinnamon sticks (broken into large pieces) in a saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce and simmer - stirring frequently - until the sugar has dissolved. Remove from heat and let cool. Discard cinnamon sticks and strain into a jar with a lid.

recipe: I used Tiquira branca, which is a Brazilian distilled beverage from fermented cassava (cauím, mandioc). The tiquira was infused with jackfruit (jaca mole). name: in the ngahere (forest)
ingredients: 'simple' sugar syrup, gin, green chartreuse liqueur, kawakawa leaves, lemon juice, sour apple liqueur

recipe:
First you need to make the kawakawa tea and simple syrup.

Kawakawa simple syrup:
1 cup white sugar
1 cup water
8-10 kawakawa leaves
Bring to a simmer, take off the heat and let leaves steep for 1hr.

Kawakawa tea:
Add 5-6 leaves to a 500ml of water and bring to a simmer. Turn the heat off and allow tea to steep for 15min. Remove the leaves and strain into a jar or small jug.

Instructions:
Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice, and strain into a chilled glass

recipe: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine 1.5 ounces Lillet, 1.5 ounces of bourbon (we like Buffalo Trace), an ounce of fresh lemon juice, a dash of Angostura bitters, and a quarter-ounce of simple syrup (equal parts sugar and water). Toss a full thyme sprig in there, too. Shake hard, and double-strain (that is, through a fine mesh strainer) into a tall glass with fresh ice. Add an ounce or two of soda water to top it off and garnish with a new thyme sprig.

ingredients_measurements: [['4.5 cl', 'Brandy Napoleon C. De Gourmont Special XO Reserve'], ['2.25 cl', 'Carpano Dry Vermouth'], ['1.5 cl', 'Miolo Seleção Pinot Grigio & Riesling'], ['0.75 cl', 'Oscar No 697 Bianco Vermouth'], ['0.75 cl', 'Honey and lavender syrup'], ['10 drop', "Scrappy's Lavender bitters"], ['10 drop', 'Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']]
recipe:
1. Em um mixing glass previamente resfriado, coloque todos os ingredientes e bastante gelo.

2. Mexa por 15 segundos com o auxílio de uma colher de bar.

2. Coe o conteúdo do mixing glass para um copo baixo com um gelo grande.

4. Decorar com ramos de lavanda comestível.

5. O zest limão-siciliano pode ser bem-vindo, mas desde que não libere muito óleo sobre o coquetel.
garnish: Ramos de Lavanda e zest pequeno de limão-siciliano (opcional).

ingredients_measurements: [['3.75 cl', 'Nardini Amaro liqueur'], ['1.5 cl', 'Cocchi Americano Bianco'], ['0.75 cl', 'Liquore Strega'], ['0.75 cl', 'Ancho Reyes chile liqueur'], ['3 cl', 'Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)'], ['0.35 cl', "'Simple' sugar syrup (1 sugar to 1 water)"], ['2.25 cl', 'Egg white'], ['1 dash', 'Angostura Aromatic Bitters'], ['4 leaf', 'Basil leaves'], ['1 ring', 'Orange peel']]
recipe: Combine all ingredients into the larger tin of a shaken tin set (18oz and 28 oz). Add one 1x1" KoldDraft Cube and seal shaker tins. Shake vigorously until cube fully dissolves and for a few seconds thereafter. In an old fashioned glass filled with rock, strain cocktail into glass with a Hawthorn strainer. Using a citrus peeler, peel an orange and express the peel over the drink.
garnish: Taking a Basil leaf lay it on the pith of the orange peel and pinch the peel from the skin side in half, sandwhich-ing the leaf between the peel. Using a pick, skewer the peel so that the leaf stays in place and drop it gently on the foam of the cocktail.

For the pumpkin spice syrup, add a cup of water, cup of sugar, half teaspoon of vanilla, teaspoon each of cinnamon and nutmeg, half teaspoon of ground ginger and a sprinkling of cloves into a saucepan. Bring to boil, then allow to simmer for 10-15 minutes, then strain.

For the cocktail, add all ingredients into a shaker with ice, then shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

recipe: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

name: taoiseach
ingredients: angostura aromatic bitters, chilled water, grenadine syrup, irish whiskey, orange bitters, sweet vermouth, triple sec
ingredients_measurements: [['4.5 cl', 'Irish whiskey'], ['1 cl', 'De Kuyper Triple Sec (40%)'], ['1 cl', 'Martini Rosso sweet vermouth'], ['0.5 cl', 'Giffard Grenadine syrup'], ['1 dash', 'Angostura Aromatic Bitters'], ['1 dash', 'Orange Bitters by Angostura'], ['0.5 cl', 'Chilled water (omit if using wet ice)']]
recipe: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: apple delight
ingredients: apple juice, bourbon whiskey, elderflower liqueur, lime cordial
ingredients_measurements: [['4.5 cl', 'Bourbon whiskey'], ['2.25 cl', 'Elderflower liqueur'], ['1.5 cl', 'Lime cordial (sweetened lime juice)'], ['6 cl', 'Apple juice']]

name: autumn breeze
ingredients: calvados & straight applejacks, cognac, lime juice, orange bitters, pierre ferrand orange curacao, rothman & winter orchard pear liqueur
ingredients_measurements: [['3 cl', 'Cognac'], ['3 cl', 'Calvados & straight applejacks'], ['1.5 cl', 'Pierre Ferrand Orange Curaçao'], ['1.5 cl', 'Rothman & Winter Orchard Pear liqueur'], ['0.25 cl', 'Lime juice (freshly squeezed)'], ['2 dash', 'Orange Bitters by Angostura']]
recipe:
Put all ingredients in a shaker with ice.
Shake for 50 shakes.
Pour into a cold Coupe glass
